title: British Lions - Trouble With Women [Mott/Medicine Head]
description:
Ex-Mott the Hoople and Medicine Head

I read a very bad review of this album on Amazon and couldn&#039;t believe the writer had heard the same recording. I love this album. If it doesn&#039;t get you first time, give it a few listens ... it&#039;s great. 

This is ripped from good quality centralized vinyl (original Cherry Red LP). I haven&#039;t heard the Angel Air CD version which the reviewer was writing about. Maybe the tapes had deteriorated over the years prior to CD release. At least the vinyl version was using Master Tapes only a few years old.


Trouble With Women 
Any Port in a Storm 
Lady Don&#039;t Fall Backwards 
High Noon 
Lay Down Your Love 
Waves of Love 
Electric Chair 
Won&#039;t You Give Him One (More Chance)
One More Chance to Run [Bonus Track - Original Album Version]



Let me know what you think of this album. I hope you enjoy it.
